00044 //Define generator - this can be global because its using convert internally
00045 template<typename SRC, typename DST> class ValueGenerator: public ValueConverterBase
00046 {
00047 public:
00048     void create( boost::scoped_ptr<ValueBase>& dst )const {
00049         LOG_IF( dst.get(), Debug, warning ) <<
00050                                             "Generating into existing value " << dst->toString( true ) << " (dropping this).";
00051         Value<DST> *ref = new Value<DST>;
00052         dst.reset( ref );
00053     }
00054     boost::numeric::range_check_result generate( const ValueBase &src, boost::scoped_ptr<ValueBase>& dst )const {
00055         create( dst );
00056         assert( dst );
00057         const boost::numeric::range_check_result result = convert( src.castToType<SRC>(), *dst );
00058         return result;
00059     }
00060 };
00061 
00063 // general converter version -- does nothing
00065 template<bool NUMERIC, bool SAME, typename SRC, typename DST> class ValueConverter : public ValueGenerator<SRC, DST>
00066 {
00067 public:
00068     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00069 };
00071 // trivial version -- for conversion of the same type
00073 template<bool NUMERIC, typename SRC, typename DST> class ValueConverter<NUMERIC, true, SRC, DST> : public ValueGenerator<SRC, DST>
00074 {
00075     ValueConverter() {
00076         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00077                 << "Creating trivial copy converter for " << Value<SRC>::staticName();
00078     };
00079 public:
00080     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00081         ValueConverter<NUMERIC, true, SRC, DST> *ret = new ValueConverter<NUMERIC, true, SRC, DST>;
00082         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00083     }
00084     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00085         SRC &dstVal = dst.castTo<SRC>();
00086         const SRC &srcVal = src.castTo<SRC>();
00087         dstVal = srcVal;
00088         return boost::numeric::cInRange;
00089     }
00090     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00091 };

00095 // Numeric version -- uses boost::numeric_cast
00097 struct NumericOverflowHandler {
00098     static boost::numeric::range_check_result result;
00099     void operator() ( boost::numeric::range_check_result r ) { // throw bad_numeric_conversion derived
00100         result = r;
00101     }
00102 };
00103 boost::numeric::range_check_result NumericOverflowHandler::result = boost::numeric::cInRange;
00104 
00105 template<typename SRC, typename DST> class ValueConverter<true, false, SRC, DST> : public ValueGenerator<SRC, DST>
00106 {
00107     ValueConverter() {
00108         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00109                 << "Creating numeric converter from "
00110                 << Value<SRC>::staticName() << " to " << Value<DST>::staticName();
00111     };
00112 public:
00113     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00114         ValueConverter<true, false, SRC, DST> *ret = new ValueConverter<true, false, SRC, DST>;
00115         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00116     }
00117     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00118         typedef boost::numeric::converter <
00119         DST, SRC,
00120            boost::numeric::conversion_traits<DST, SRC>,
00121            NumericOverflowHandler,
00122            boost::numeric::RoundEven<SRC>
00123            > converter;
00124         DST &dstVal = dst.castTo<DST>();
00125         const SRC &srcVal = src.castTo<SRC>();
00126         NumericOverflowHandler::result = boost::numeric::cInRange;
00127         dstVal = converter::convert( srcVal );
00128         return NumericOverflowHandler::result;
00129     }
00130     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00131 };
00132 
00134 // vector4 version -- uses ValueConverter on every element
00136 template<typename SRC, typename DST > class ValueConverter<false, false, vector4<SRC>, vector4<DST> >: public ValueGenerator<vector4<SRC>, vector4<DST> >
00137 {
00138     boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> m_conv;
00139     ValueConverter( boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> elem_conv ): m_conv( elem_conv ) {
00140         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00141                 << "Creating vector converter from "
00142                 << Value<vector4<SRC> >::staticName() << " to " << Value<vector4<DST> >::staticName();
00143     };
00144 public:
00145     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00146         typedef boost::mpl::and_<boost::is_arithmetic<SRC>, boost::is_arithmetic<DST> > is_num;
00147         typedef boost::is_same<SRC, DST> is_same;
00148         boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> elem_conv =
00149             ValueConverter<is_num::value, is_same::value, SRC, DST>::get();
00150 
00151         if ( elem_conv ) {
00152             ValueConverter<false, false, vector4<SRC>, vector4<DST> > *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, vector4<SRC>, vector4<DST> >( elem_conv );
00153             return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00154         } else {
00155             return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>();
00156         }
00157     }
00158     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00159         vector4<DST> &dstVal = dst.castTo<vector4<DST> >();
00160         const vector4<SRC> &srcVal = src.castTo<vector4<SRC> >();
00161         boost::numeric::range_check_result ret = boost::numeric::cInRange;
00162 
00163         for ( int i = 0; i < 4; i++ ) {//slow and ugly, but flexible
00164             Value<DST> elem_dst;
00165             const boost::numeric::range_check_result result = m_conv->convert( Value<SRC>( srcVal[i] ), elem_dst );
00166 
00167             if ( result != boost::numeric::cInRange )
00168                 ret = result;
00169 
00170             dstVal[i] = ( DST )elem_dst;
00171         }
00172 
00173         return ret;
00174     }
00175     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00176 };
00177 
00179 // list version -- uses ValueConverter on every element
00181 template<typename SRC, typename DST > class ValueConverter<false, false, std::list<SRC>, std::list<DST> >: public ValueGenerator<std::list<SRC>, std::list<DST> >
00182 {
00183     boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> m_conv;
00184     ValueConverter( boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> elem_conv ): m_conv( elem_conv ) {
00185         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00186                 << "Creating list converter from "
00187                 << Value<std::list<SRC> >::staticName() << " to " << Value<std::list<DST> >::staticName();
00188     };
00189 public:
00190     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00191         typedef boost::mpl::and_<boost::is_arithmetic<SRC>, boost::is_arithmetic<DST> > is_num;
00192         typedef boost::is_same<SRC, DST> is_same;
00193         boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> elem_conv =
00194             ValueConverter<is_num::value, is_same::value, SRC, DST>::get();
00195 
00196         if ( elem_conv ) {
00197             ValueConverter<false, false, std::list<SRC>, std::list<DST> > *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::list<SRC>, std::list<DST> >( elem_conv );
00198             return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00199         } else {
00200             return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>();
00201         }
00202     }
00203     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00204         std::list<DST> &dstVal = dst.castTo<std::list<DST> >();
00205         LOG_IF( ! dstVal.empty(), CoreLog, warning )
00206                 << "Storing into non empty list while conversion from "
00207                 << Value<std::list<SRC> >::staticName() << " to " << Value<std::list<DST> >::staticName();
00208         const std::list<SRC> &srcVal = src.castTo<std::list<SRC> >();
00209         boost::numeric::range_check_result ret = boost::numeric::cInRange;
00210 
00211         for ( typename std::list<SRC>::const_iterator i = srcVal.begin(); i != srcVal.end(); i++ ) {//slow and ugly, but flexible
00212             Value<DST> elem_dst;
00213             const boost::numeric::range_check_result result = m_conv->convert( Value<SRC>( *i ), elem_dst );
00214 
00215             if ( result != boost::numeric::cInRange )
00216                 ret = result;
00217 
00218             dstVal.push_back( ( DST )elem_dst );
00219         }
00220 
00221         return ret;
00222     }
00223     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00224 };

00228 // string version -- uses lexical_cast to convert from/to string
00230 template<typename DST> class ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, DST> : public ValueGenerator<std::string, DST>
00231 {
00232     ValueConverter() {
00233         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00234                 << "Creating from-string converter for " << Value<DST>::staticName();
00235     };
00236 public:
00237     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00238         ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, DST> *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, DST>;
00239         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00240     }
00241     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00242         DST &dstVal = dst.castTo<DST>();
00243         const std::string &srcVal = src.castTo<std::string>();
00244         dstVal = boost::lexical_cast<DST>( srcVal );
00245         return boost::numeric::cInRange; //@todo handle bad casts
00246     }
00247     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00248 };
00249 template<typename SRC> class ValueConverter<false, false, SRC, std::string> : public ValueGenerator<SRC, std::string>
00250 {
00251     ValueConverter() {
00252         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00253                 << "Creating to-string converter for " << Value<SRC>::staticName();
00254     };
00255 public:
00256     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00257         ValueConverter<false, false, SRC, std::string> *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, SRC, std::string>;
00258         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00259     }
00260     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00261         std::string &dstVal = dst.castTo<std::string>();
00262         const SRC &srcVal = src.castTo<SRC>();
00263         dstVal = boost::lexical_cast<std::string, SRC>( srcVal );
00264         return boost::numeric::cInRange; // this should allways be ok
00265     }
00266     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00267 };

00270 // special version to convert from string to a given selection
00271 // (lexical_cast doesnt work here, because it creates a temporary buffer)
00273 template<> class ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, Selection> : public ValueGenerator<std::string, Selection>
00274 {
00275     ValueConverter() {
00276         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00277                 << "Creating special from-string converter for " << Value<Selection>::staticName();
00278     };
00279 public:
00280     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00281         ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, Selection> *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, Selection>;
00282         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00283     }
00284     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00285         Selection &dstVal = dst.castTo<Selection>();
00286         const std::string &srcVal = src.castTo<std::string>();
00287 
00288         if ( dstVal.set( srcVal.c_str() ) )
00289             return boost::numeric::cInRange;
00290         else
00291             return boost::numeric::cPosOverflow; //if the string is not "part" of the selection we count this as positive overflow
00292     }
00293     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00294 };

00298 // string/bool version -- uses decision based on text
00300 template<> class ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, bool> : public ValueGenerator<std::string, bool>
00301 {
00302     ValueConverter() {
00303         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00304                 << "Creating special from-string converter for " << Value<bool>::staticName();
00305     };
00306 public:
00307     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00308         ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, bool> *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, bool>;
00309         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00310     }
00311     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00312         bool &dstVal = dst.castTo<bool>();
00313         const std::string srcVal = boost::algorithm::to_lower_copy<std::string>( src.castTo<std::string>() );
00314 
00315         if (  srcVal == "true" || srcVal == "y" || srcVal == "yes" ) {
00316             dstVal = true;
00317         } else if ( srcVal == "false" || srcVal == "n" || srcVal == "no" ) {
00318             dstVal = false;
00319         } else {
00320             LOG( Runtime, warning ) << src.toString( true ) << " is ambiguous while converting to " << Value<bool>::staticName();
00321             return boost::numeric::cPosOverflow;
00322         }
00323 
00324         return boost::numeric::cInRange;
00325     }
00326     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00327 };
00328 template<> class ValueConverter<false, false, bool, std::string> : public ValueGenerator<bool, std::string>
00329 {
00330     ValueConverter() {
00331         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00332                 << "Creating special to-string converter for " << Value<bool>::staticName();
00333     };
00334 public:
00335     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00336         ValueConverter<false, false, bool, std::string> *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, bool, std::string>;
00337         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00338     }
00339     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00340         std::string &dstVal = dst.castTo<std::string>();
00341         const bool &srcVal = src.castTo<bool>();
00342         dstVal = srcVal ? "true" : "false";
00343         return boost::numeric::cInRange;
00344     }
00345     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00346 };

00350 // string => list/vector version -- uses util::stringToList
00352 template<typename DST> class ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, std::list<DST> >: public ValueGenerator<std::string, std::list<DST> >  //string => list
00353 {
00354     ValueConverter() {
00355         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00356                 << "Creating from-string converter for " << Value<std::list<DST> >::staticName();
00357     };
00358 public:
00359     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00360         ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, std::list<DST> > *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, std::list<DST> >;
00361         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00362     }
00363     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00364         std::list<DST> &dstVal = dst.castTo<std::list<DST> >();
00365         LOG_IF( ! dstVal.empty(), CoreLog, warning )
00366                 << "Conversion from " << Value<std::string>::staticName()
00367                 << " into non empty list  " << Value<std::list<DST> >::staticName()
00368                 << " previous content will be lost";
00369         const std::string &srcVal = src.castTo<std::string>();
00370         const std::list<DST> buff = util::stringToList<DST>( srcVal, boost::regex( "[\\s,;]+" ) );
00371         dstVal.assign( buff.begin(), buff.end() );
00372         return boost::numeric::cInRange;  //@todo handle bad casts
00373     }
00374     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00375 };
00376 template<typename DST> class ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, vector4<DST> >: public ValueGenerator<std::string, vector4<DST> >  //string => vector4
00377 {
00378     ValueConverter() {
00379         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00380                 << "Creating from-string converter for " << Value<vector4<DST> >::staticName();
00381     };
00382 public:
00383     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00384         ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, vector4<DST> > *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, vector4<DST> >;
00385         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00386     }
00387     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00388         vector4<DST> &dstVal = dst.castTo<vector4<DST> >();
00389         const std::string &srcVal = src.castTo<std::string>();
00390         const std::list<DST> buff = stringToList<DST>( srcVal, boost::regex( "[\\s,;]+" ) );
00391         dstVal.copyFrom( buff.begin(), buff.end() );
00392         return boost::numeric::cInRange; //@todo handle bad casts
00393     }
00394     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00395 };

00411 //OK, thats about the foreplay. Now we get to the dirty stuff.

00416 template<typename SRC> struct inner_TypeConverter {
00417     std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> > &m_subMap;
00418     inner_TypeConverter( std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> > &subMap ): m_subMap( subMap ) {}
00419     template<typename DST> void operator()( DST ) { //will be called by the mpl::for_each in outer_TypeConverter for any DST out of "types"
00420         //create a converter based on the type traits and the types of SRC and DST
00421         typedef boost::mpl::and_<boost::is_arithmetic<SRC>, boost::is_arithmetic<DST> > is_num;
00422         typedef boost::is_same<SRC, DST> is_same;
00423         boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> conv =
00424             ValueConverter<is_num::value, is_same::value, SRC, DST>::get();
00425         //and insert it into the to-conversion-map of SRC
00426         m_subMap.insert( m_subMap.end(), std::make_pair( Value<DST>::staticID, conv ) );
00427     }
00428 };
00429 
00431 struct outer_TypeConverter {
00432     std::map< int , std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> > > &m_map;
00433     outer_TypeConverter( std::map< int , std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> > > &map ): m_map( map ) {}
00434     template<typename SRC> void operator()( SRC ) {//will be called by the mpl::for_each in ValueConverterMap() for any SRC out of "types"
00435         boost::mpl::for_each<types>( // create a functor for from-SRC-conversion and call its ()-operator for any DST out of "types"
00436             inner_TypeConverter<SRC>( m_map[Value<SRC>().getTypeID()] )
00437         );
00438     }
00439 };
00441 
00442 ValueConverterMap::ValueConverterMap()
00443 {
00444     boost::mpl::for_each<types>( outer_TypeConverter( *this ) );
00445     LOG( Debug, info ) << "conversion map for " << size() << " types created";
00446 }
00447 
00448 }
00449 }
